txt.en: This note details Halach's guard rotations, taking special care to point out potential weaknesses.\n\nYou ought to bring this note to Irodon in Halach.
Bring the note to Irodon in Halach
You have found a concerning note at a Corsair camp-site.

'The Corsairs have been scattered since the war's end. A handful of foolhardy ones do not pose as a significant threat, but it's best to be cautious.\n\n'Thank you for bringing this to my attention. I'll pass the information on.'
You have found a Corsair note detailing Halach's guard rotations.\n\nYou ought to bring this note to Irodon in Halach, which is south-west of the camp-site.
